entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
